Description: Part of a painted limestone relief: two male figures(heads lost) and a column of Hieroglyphic text naming Bebi; jackal to the left.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr Harry Reginald Holland Hall
Curator's comments: Published: PM II (2): p.397 Holzl, R, HAB: Agyptische Opfertafeln und Kultbecken, p.170
Bibliographic references: Hall 1922 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 6. (pl.24)
